Articles.Content:
A state of the art VTOL from Trinity corporation, the Reaper comes in style.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

It is a crew transport VTOL with gunship capabilities, and comes with a 20mm vulcan and 30mm chaingun included! she flies "well" and can "land" "unharmed" on "any" surface. with a good pilot, this is a weapon ro be feared. .craft soon. requires KAS, IR, and BDarmory.

wait, why isn't IMGUR working!? NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO- kay, it isn't that serious, but i do need help.

Fixing Imgur album tags :)
Looks almost like the Republic Gunship from Star Wars. Very cool!
thanks! i guess i got my inspiration from star wars, but just didn't notice it until now.
